dct_description_sm:
This coverage and associated databases contain data from selected
fields of five tables in the MAS/MILS database. This database was
transferred to the U.S. Geological Survey from the U.S. Bureau of
Mines upon its closure in 1996. The database is considered archival
and will be incorporated into the U.S. Geological Survey mineral
location database along with the MRDS database.
